title: Shyvana Dragon Form Taunts
body: I have played a couple of games in the past few days and have noticed that while in dragon form Shyvana will sometimes do her human form taunts.

replies.body:
Hiya TheLastShadow45!

I've been trying to repro this on Live at the moment, and I can't seem to get her human form taunt ("Come get a glimpse into the belly of the beast!") to play in Dragon form. Do you know how often the human form taunt seems to come out? Any extra info is super appreciated! :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot LoveStrut,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=LxNfxMWA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-22T20:27:26.770+0000)
>
> Hiya TheLastShadow45!
> 
> I've been trying to repro this on Live at the moment, and I can't seem to get her human form taunt ("Come get a glimpse into the belly of the beast!") to play in Dragon form. Do you know how often the human form taunt seems to come out? Any extra info is super appreciated! :]

I have the habit of digging up old threads. 

I've noticed Shyvana just doesn't have taunts in dragon form. She has a laugh. And I think 2 skins have a recal. But otherwise her dragon for is lacking.

It happened randomly for me. I was also using Championship Shyvana.

Edit: Just got it with normal Shyv. All I did was ult and I heard "What do you get when a dragon sneezes" for my joke and her human taunt.

Hi TheLastShadow45!

Thanks for the reply and update! If you would like, the next time this occurs it would be super helpful to us to get your R3d logs (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs) for your game. You can just attach the file here!

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=LxNfxMWA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-03-29T02:56:02.024+0000)
>
> I'll try to remember.

Awesome, thank you!

Hey TheLastShadow45! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a listen and see what's going on here. :]
